landing.description: Comfortable and safe transfer service from Istanbul Airport to city center. We are at your service 24/7 with our professional drivers and Mercedes Vito vehicles. We also offer Istanbul, Sapanca, Bursa, Abant tours and quality hotel accommodation options.

questions.reservationAnswer: To make a reservation, click the 'Send Reservation Request' button or contact us via WhatsApp. We determine the most suitable time for you and create your reservation.
questions.pricingAnswer: Yes, our prices are completely fixed. You see your fee instantly when you enter the locations. There are no surprise fees.
questions.flightDelay: What happens in case of flight delay?
questions.flightDelayAnswer: We track your flight and wait without additional fee in case of delay. Customer satisfaction is our priority.
questions.luggageAnswer: Our Mercedes Vito vehicles have large luggage capacity. There is no limit for normal travel luggage. Please inform us in advance for special items.
questions.babySeatAnswer: Yes, baby seat service is available. It is sufficient to specify this request when making a reservation.
questions.paymentAnswer: You can pay with cash, credit card or transfer. Payment options are determined during reservation.
questions.cancellationAnswer: No fee is charged for reservations cancelled 24 hours in advance. Certain conditions apply for last minute cancellations.
questions.driverInfoAnswer: After your reservation is confirmed, driver information is sent to you via WhatsApp. Our driver meets you at the designated point.
questions.meetingPoint: Where is the meeting point at the airport?
questions.meetingPointAnswer: We meet at the exit gate at Istanbul Airport, at the designated meeting point at Sabiha Gökçen.
questions.groupReservationAnswer: Yes, we make special pricing for group reservations. You can learn the details by contacting us via WhatsApp.
